pages.text: $(l:intro/cursed_cage)Cursed Cages$() are fine and dandy, but you're starting to get sick of constantly putting and removing your precious totem from them.
Fortunately, with power of Activated Emeralds, you have found a way to transfer Soul Energies from an $(l:crafts/artifice/arca)Arca$() to a $(l:intro/cursed_cage)Cursed Cage$().

Simply right-click the Transfer Gem on the $(l:crafts/artifice/arca)Arca$() and it will bound to it and it's owner. Then, put the Transfer Gem within the $(l:intro/cursed_cage)Cursed Cage$() and it will siphon Soul Energy from the $(l:crafts/artifice/arca)Arca$() when it's being used.
